name: Beef Up!
description:
A farmer is protecting his cows from the obnoxious aliens. Can you shoot them down before it's too late?

I think I estimated my time wrong, I ended up having to rush through it very hard on the last day. There may very well be major bugs with the scoring system or just balancing issues I didn't notice due to too little time spent on testing.

Oh, and this game isn't infinite, there is an end to it. Theoretically you should be able to get there. Good luck! :D

Controls:

- WASD to move around and jump. You can also climb on top of an escalating cow with W

- Left click to shoot

Everything else is made by me, except

- Musics (Composed by Touko Kinnunen)

- Sounds from starter content/internet
